radio_group_multiple_choice_questions.text: The name of Pink Floyd's bassist is:
For which of his movies did the italian director Michelangelo Antonioni commission the soundtrack to Pink Floyd?
Which of these songs is part of Pink Floyd's album Meddle?
Which of the following Pink Floyd's song is dedicated to former member Syd Barrett?
Which Pink Floyd's album contains their longest title song?
wrong_answers: The Piper at the Gates of Dawn
The Dark Side of the Moon

radio_group_multiple_choice_questions.text: In which band did David Gilmour play before joining Pink Floyd?
